headline: NiSource (NYSE:NI) Faces Shareholder Proposal; Company Advises to Vote Against It
summary: NiSource (NYSE:NI) recently witnessed significant shareholder engagement with a proposal for amending special meeting rules, as the management advised voters against it, highlighting potential governance tensions. Despite the broader market experiencing steep declines, including a 5% drop in the Dow, NiSource's stock managed an 8.6% gain over the last quarter. This positive movement aligns with the company's favorable net income growth reported in February. While market indices like the S&P...
